ResearchProjectDef.label: Telvanni sowing Vol. I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the sowing of plants specially designed by the Telvanni to produce salts.\n\nEach of these plants grows faster under certain weather conditions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Telvanni sowing Vol. II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the sowing of plants specially designed by the Telvanni to produce extracts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Telvanni sowing Vol. III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the sowing of plants specially designed by the Telvanni to produce exotic materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Telvanni sowing Vol. IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the sowing of plants specially designed by the Telvanni to produce resources.
